Reviews.Title: " Here's Looking at You..."
Reviews.Author: R Negrette
Reviews.Content: Pretty Cool Camera... Image is Clear, Does What it's Intended For... Mic Works Awesom! The Only Thing That I Have Bad to Say is The Actual Camera Housing Can Be LiL Difficult to Thread On  During Istallation...

ProductInfo.Features:
600TVL Horizontal Resolution, built-in 1/3" Sony CCD image sensor
Build-in 20 LED IR illuminators for night vision.0 Lux ( IR LED ON)
Weatherproof aluminum housing construction
Build-in f 3.6mm Lens for wide view
Pre-Amp mini hidden microphone, video audio power cable, 12V DC 500ma power supply included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Night Vision Infrared Dome Security Camera Built-in 1/3'' Sony CCD 600TVL High Resolution Vandal Proof Weatherproof 20 IR LEDs for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance Sysyem with Pre-Amp Mini Hidden Microphone, Video Audio Power Cable and Bonus Power Supply 1V3
